Description language: Wraps Make, Ant, Maven, MsBuild, Nant, etc. for controlled build, deploy, test processes.
C# for build scripts, XML for high level dependencies

graphical IDE with support for Ant/NAnt, MSBuild, JScript, VBScript, IronPython, PowerShell

MSBuild, Windows Presentation Foundation, JSON - REST interfaces, Programmatic (Can generate definitions through code)
